price: او كله چې خلك راغونډ كړل شي نو بيا به يې دښمنان وي او له عبادته څخه به يې منكر وي.
arabic: وَإِذَا حُشِرَ ٱلنَّاسُ كَانُواْ لَهُمۡ أَعۡدَآءٗ وَكَانُواْ بِعِبَادَتِهِمۡ كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ḥushira al-nāsu kānū lahum aʿdāan wakānū biʿibādatihim kāfirīna
